card.title: Overview
card.content:
With this dialog you can ...
- checkout the RMSD value of the structure alignment. - checkout how many residues were aligned during the structure alignment. - color the protein pair based on the RMSD value. - export the distance data as .csv file. - open the *Distance Data Visualizer*.

guide.title: Color protein pair by RMSD value

steps.step: Select a protein pair from the tree.
Click on |open_in_new_w200|, to load the pymol session of the selected protein pair.
Choose **By RMSD** in the combobox besides *Color Protein Pair*.

details.item: The total number of residues in the *Aligned Residues* metric comes from the first protein.
If the RMSD value is 0.0, then the *Distance Data Visualizer* cannot be opened.
